fields.name: Trouble with making purchases?
fields.value: If you cannot make purchases, visit visit [Google Support](https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/1050566) or[App Store support page](https://support.apple.com/billing) for help.

fields.name: Trouble with delivery?
fields.value:
Send an e-mail to armies_help@boooea.com
along with the following information:
1. What kind of product you have purchased.
2. Screenshot with the payment info (order number)
3.Your PvP ID.
